description:
In this first video volume of 12 volumes 3D Instructor Adam Gibson introduces the beginner 3D student how to get up and started quickly with 3D Coat Version 4.

Topics Covered: Importing and Exporting or Models, Creating Quick UV Maps, Voxel Sculpting Introduction, Retopology Introduction, and Exporting Color, Specular and Normals Maps.

Running Time: 1 hr. 54 mins.

Video Format: MP4 (.mp4)

Level: Beginner
title: 3D Coat 4- Volume 1: Getting Started
